summary: The client instructed to add a new item as US-016 to the backlog at the end. The SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT attempted an HTTP POST to add the story but failed with a 404 Not Found error.

actions.task: Investigate and resolve the 404 error when adding backlog story US-016

backlog_deltas.title: Add item as US-016 at the end (attempt failed)

risks.mitigation: Verify endpoint existence and correct URL or implement the endpoint if missing
